channel.title: Basic scripts to study plz?
channel.description: i'm new to scripting, and it looks like you can do some pretty awesome things with some of those functions. so i was hopin someone could make a couple simple scripts for me to study. something simple, doesnt really matter what, just something i can learn what the functions do and how to set them up :D thx in advance, anyone who helps :)
